name: Jxshin.GitHub.io
body: ### Welcome to my home page! I am a Ph.D. student in the Institute of Software,School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University, P. R. China. I received my Bachelor degree from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China in 2011. I'm interested in mining software repositories to understand technical and social aspects of software development. ### Publications Jiaxin Zhu, Minghui Zhou, and Audris Mockus. 2016. Effectiveness of Code Contribution: From Patch-Based to Pull-Request-Based Tools. (Accepted by FSE 2016) Jiaxin Zhu, Minghui Zhou, and Hong Mei. 2016. [Multi-extract and multi-level dataset of mozilla issue tracking history](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2903502). In Proceedings of the 13th International Conference on Mining Software Repositories (MSR '16). Jiaxin Zhu, Minghui Zhou, and Audris Mockus. 2014. [Patterns of folder use and project popularity: a case study of github repositories](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2652564). In Proceedings of the 8th ACM/IEEE International Symposium on Empirical Software Engineering and Measurement (ESEM '14). Jiaxin Zhu, Hongwu Lin, Minghui Zhou, and Hong Mei. 2012. [Review code evolution history in OSS universe](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2430488). In Proceedings of the Fourth Asia-Pacific Symposium on Internetware (Internetware '12). ### Contact me zhujiaxin@pku.edu.cn
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
